queries:
MATCH (source:Entity {name: $source_name})
                MATCH (target:Entity {name: $target_name})
                CREATE (source)-[:provides {
                    description: 'Harry\'s Bagels provides the order to the customer.',
                    type: 'provides',
                    direction: 'forward'
                }]->(target)

MATCH (source:Entity {name: $source_name})
                MATCH (target:Entity {name: $target_name})
                CREATE (source)-[:contains {
                    description: 'The order contains the item Water.',
                    type: 'contains',
                    direction: 'forward'
                }]->(target)

MATCH (source:Entity {name: $source_name})
                MATCH (target:Entity {name: $target_name})
                CREATE (source)-[:associated_with {
                    description: 'The order is associated with a payment.',
                    type: 'associated_with',
                    direction: 'forward'
                }]->(target)
